DeathSteel::

He gets up and growls. "I can do better in real battle." he said. 
Taking his battle blade in the center, he disconnected it and 
returned the wings to thier normal position. He stormed off to the 
infermery to get his leg checked. After returning inside, he smiled 
to himself. Those who are over confident will faulter and then be 
overcome, he thought. He went to the infermery where the maintenance 
bots tended to his leg.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He hops to his feet and backs away from DeathSteel.  He 
twirls his 
> scimitars and then sheaths them on his hips.  "As I said before.  
Adequate.  
> Now go tend to your wounds, you will be needed soon."  He walks 
over to 
> Tyrael and motions for him to join him off to the side for a 
private 
> conversation after DeathSteel leaves.
